title: MT5: New Account (request)
description: This call creates new MT5 user, either demo or real money user.

account_type.description: Account type. If set to 'financial', setting 'mt5_account_type' is also required.

address.description: [Optional] The address of the user. The maximum length of this address field is 128 characters.

company.description: [Optional] Name of the client's company. The maximum length of the company name is 64 characters.

currency.description: [Optional] MT5 account currency, the default value will be the qualified account currency.

dry_run.description: [Optional] If set to 1, only validation is performed.

investPassword.description: [Optional] The investor password of the account. For validation (Accepts any printable ASCII character. Must be within 8-25 characters, and include numbers, lowercase and uppercase letters. Must not be the same as the user's email address).

mainPassword.description: The master password of the account. For validation (Accepts any printable ASCII character. Must be within 8-25 characters, and include numbers, lowercase and uppercase letters. Must not be the same as the user's email address). This field is required.

mt5_account_category.description: [Optional] To choose whether account is conventional or swap_free. Unavailable for financial_stp MT5_account_type

mt5_account_type.description: [Optional] Financial: Variable spreads, High leverage. Financial STP: Variable spreads, Medium Leverage, more products. If 'account_type' set to 'financial', setting 'mt5_account_type' is also required.

name.description: Client's name. The maximum length here is 101 characters.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
